text: Puzzle & Dragons is a Japanese mobile game. It was developed by GungHo Online Entertainment. There is a role-playing game at the top where the player gets to fight dragons and other monsters. The lower part of the screen is a puzzle game. Players have to replace the gems and connect three gems of the same color. == Other websites == * Official English website of Puzzle & Dragons Category:2012 video games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Crossover video games Category:Gacha games Category:IOS games Category:Role-playing video games Category:Video games about dragons Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Puzzle & Dragons
